args:
Luca is assailed by illusions, but Mascula's
sword makes him remember his friends, which
saves him. Luca then manages to inspire the
prince and save him from terrible visions.
But when they head off to reunite with everyone,
Kai Yan appears and goes on the attack!
H-hey, I'm back in the village!\nThe one we all worked so hard to build!
I gotta hurry and put it out before... Huh?
Is that a rokkan? Hey, buddy! You okay?
Oh hell, that's a bad wound...\nWhat the heck happened here?
You founded this fool's dream\nof a village...
A place where different races live in\nharmony was a pipe dream from the\nvery beginning...
Dammit! He's the one who did all this,\nand he's gonna PAY!
Wait, I remember. I was traveling with\n{player_name} and everyone to...
That's right! We were all headed to the\nFaerie Kingdom in North Grastaea!
Holy crap, I'm really in the snow on a\nmountain!
And THIS is all a stupid illusion!
Whew! That was a close one.
Er, but I'm still surrounded by snow\neverywhere I look, which ain't great.\nWhere's everyone else?
No, stop! You've got it wrong!
Just calm down and listen to me!
Why should we listen to a boy who isn't\neven our rightful prince? You tricked us!
Now that we know you aren't royalty,\nour kingdom has no need of you.
It's true that the blood of the royal family\ndoes not run in my veins...
But my desire to build a kingdom where\nwe can all live in peace is very much real.\nPlease, you must believe me!
You must think us a bunch of real suckers\nto fall for a yarn like that. Get outta here!
I'm disappointed in you. You deceived us.\nYou let everyone down.
Just...no! Just wait and listen to me!\nI know I can make you understand!
You're just some nobody.\nNo one needs you.
You folk really should clear outta that\ncastle, too.
Ah! Where did you all come from?!
Are you leaving the Halidom, too?\nAre ALL of you leaving?
They left. They ALL left. I only came this far\nbecause of their support, and now...
How can I rescue Zethia and bring peace\nto the world all by myself?
Well, it doesn't matter; I'm not giving up!
I can't let the hopes and dreams of all the\npeople who helped me go to waste!
I may not be royalty, and I may be alone...
But I'll find a way to do this regardless!
Okay, great, you can hear me.\nNow hurry your butt back here, man!
Back...? Wait. So you're saying that\nall of this is just...an illusion?
Then I'm not at the Halidom...
Man, do you REALLY think your friends\nwould just ditch out on you like that?
Now wake the hell up already!
Whoa, easy there. You're still unsteady.\nYou must've been caught in that illusion\nfor a lot longer than I thought.
Here, take a swig of this special\nsylvan medicine.
Stuff takes a little bit to kick in,\nbut it really works.
Okay, now we gotta find everyone else,\nso hold onto me and I'll help you up.
There's no need for you to be apologizing.\nNow c'mon, off we go—and if you need a\npiggyback, there's no shame in asking.
Actually, that medicine is working already;\nI think I'll be able to walk on my own.
You say that, but your legs are shakier\nthan one of Cleo's Dragonyule puddings.
{player_name}, you wanna get\nto the Faerie Kingdom, right?
Yes, of course. But I feel guilty for\ndragging the rest of you on my own\nself-indulgent journey.

You REALLY need to break that habit of
worrying so much about burdening
people. I mean, I suppose it's a virtue,
but still.
Look, I came here because I wanted to,\nand I know everyone else did, too.\nSo don't even think twice about it.
Y'know, before we even went to Grams,\nRanzal asked me what I wanted.
Yeah. And I did some thinking—a lot of\nit, actually. And what I really want is to\nknow your true identity for myself.
You have this intense desire to learn\nexactly who and what you are,\nand I really respect that.

And honestly, this is the first time I've
ever heard you want something just for
yourself. Not for the sake of peace or
the world or whatever, but for YOU.
And if this is the one thing that you want\nfor yourself, I'm gonna do everything I can\nto support it. So lean on me more.
Because no matter who you end up being,\nI'm still going to be your friend.
And I know for a fact that everyone else\nfeels exactly the same.
Luca, I don't know what to say except...\nWell, thank you.
You are a man who exists stubbornly\nbeyond clemency.

You defy all natural law, dragging forward
those who ought to be left behind and
trying to save their lives beyond the point
of usefulness.
Kai Yan! And this is sure no illusion...\nI swear, these Agito guys must practice\nhaving the world's crappiest timing.
Your behavior is wholly heretical.\nAll who spread evil and vice must be\nsummarily crushed.
I cannot stand those who would\ncollude with the weak.
Welp, guess I shoulda seen this coming...\nCan you fight, {player_name}?
Just don't push yourself too far,\nand remember that I've got your back!
Now bring it on, ya oversized hamhock!
We are the invincible arm that rules\nover all species. We are AGITO!
My perfect form, honed to peerlessness,\nshall be both my weapon and the\ninstrument of your culling!
